articles.basic_headline: Nvidia stock climbs as CFO says new chip to ship in 2024
articles.title: Nvidia stock climbs as CFO says new chip to ship in 2024
articles.description: Nvidia's stock climbed on Tuesday after the heavyweight chipmaker said its new flagship AI processor is expected to ship later this year and CEO Jensen Huang said he is chasing a data center market potentially greater than $250 billion.
articles.web: Nvidia stock climbs as CFO says new chip to ship in 2024

articles.basic_headline: European patent applications hit record high in 2023
articles.title: European patent applications hit record high in 2023
articles.description: The European Patent Office (EPO) received a record number of patent applications last year, with the biggest share of fillings coming from the United States, Germany, Japan and China, the office's register showed on Tuesday.
articles.web: European patent applications hit record high in 2023

articles.basic_headline: Nvidia supplier SK Hynix begins mass production of next generation memory chip
articles.title: Nvidia supplier SK Hynix begins mass production of next generation memory chip
articles.description: SK Hynix Inc said on Tuesday it has begun mass production of next-generation high-bandwidth memory (HBM) chips used in artificial intelligence chipsets, with sources saying initial shipments will go to Nvidia this month.
articles.web: Nvidia supplier SK Hynix begins mass production of next generation memory chip

articles.basic_headline: Nvidia launches cloud-based research platform for 6G research and testing
articles.title: Nvidia launches cloud-based research platform for 6G research and testing
articles.description: Nvidia on Monday unveiled an AI-powered software platform that allows research into 6G technology through simulating communications environments in the cloud.
articles.web: Nvidia launches cloud-based research platform for 6G research and testing

articles.basic_headline: Apple in talks to let Google's Gemini power iPhone AI features, Bloomberg News says
articles.title: Apple in talks to let Google's Gemini power iPhone AI features, Bloomberg News says
articles.description: Apple is in talks to build Google's Gemini artificial intelligence engine into the iPhone, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the situation.
articles.web: Apple in talks to let Google's Gemini power iPhone AI features, Bloomberg News says

articles.basic_headline: Exclusive: TSMC considering advanced chip packaging capacity in Japan, sources say
articles.title: Exclusive: TSMC considering advanced chip packaging capacity in Japan, sources say
articles.description: Taiwan's TSMC is looking at building advanced packaging capacity in Japan, according to two sources familiar with the matter, a move that would add momentum to Japan's efforts to reboot its semiconductor industry.
articles.web: TSMC considering advanced chip packaging capacity in Japan, sources say

articles.basic_headline: Samsung C&T shares fall amid test of South Korea's corporate reform push
articles.title: Samsung C&T shares fall amid test of South Korea's corporate reform push
articles.description: Shares in South Korea's Samsung C&T fell by 10% on Friday after shareholders defeated a proposal by activist funds to lift dividend payouts, disappointing investors amid a government push to lift the value of Seoul-listed companies.
articles.web: Samsung C&T shares fall amid test of South Korea's corporate reform push

articles.basic_headline: Samsung poised to win over $6 bln from US for expanded investment, Bloomberg News reports
articles.title: Samsung poised to win over $6 bln from US for expanded investment, Bloomberg News reports
articles.description: The U.S. plans to award more than $6 billion to Samsung Electronics Co , helping the chipmaker expand beyond a project in Texas it has already announced, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.
articles.web: Samsung poised to win over $6 bln from US for expanded investment, Bloomberg News reports

articles.basic_headline: US agency probes risks of foreign satellite use by handheld devices
articles.title: US agency probes risks of foreign satellite use by handheld devices
articles.description: The Federal Communications Commission said Thursday it is investigating if the use of Russian and Chinese foreign satellite systems by U.S. mobile phones and other devices poses security threats.
articles.web: US agency probes risks of foreign satellite use by handheld devices

articles.basic_headline: Biden to announce Intel chips grant in Arizona next week, sources say
articles.title: Biden to announce Intel chips grant in Arizona next week, sources say
articles.description: President Joe Biden and Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo plan to unveil next week in Arizona a multi-billion-dollar award for Intel to expand its chip production in the United States, two people familiar with the matter said on Thursday.
articles.web: Biden to announce Intel chips grant in Arizona next week, sources say

articles.basic_headline: Exclusive: Samsung to use tech favoured by SK Hynix as AI chip making race heats up, sources say
articles.title: Exclusive: Samsung to use tech favoured by SK Hynix as AI chip making race heats up
articles.description: Samsung Electronics plans to use a chip making technology championed by rival SK Hynix, five people said, as the world's top memory chipmaker seeks to catch up in the race to produce high-end chips used to power artificial intelligence.
articles.web: Exclusive: Samsung to use tech favoured by SK Hynix as AI chip making race heats up

articles.basic_headline: Samsung, SK Hynix halt old equipment sales over fears of US backlash, FT reports
articles.title: Samsung, SK Hynix halt old equipment sales over fears of US backlash, FT reports
articles.description: Chipmakers Samsung Electronics and South Korea's SK Hynix Inc have stopped selling used chipmaking equipment for fear of falling foul of U.S. export controls on China and western sanctions on Russia, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.
articles.web: Samsung, SK Hynix halt old equipment sales over fears of US backlash, FT reports

articles.basic_headline: Musk says X's long-form videos will soon be available on smart TVs
articles.title: Musk says X's long-form videos will soon be available on smart TVs
articles.description: Long-form videos will soon be available on smart televisions, billionaire Elon Musk said, after Fortune magazine reported that social network X planned to launch next week a TV app for Amazon and Samsung users.
articles.web: Musk says X's long-form videos will soon be available on smart TVs

articles.basic_headline: Foreign firms warn Vietnam of investment freeze without new tax offset, source says
articles.title: Foreign firms warn Vietnam of investment freeze without new tax offset, source says
articles.description: Large foreign multinationals said they may freeze new investment plans in Vietnam in the absence of subsidies to help offset the cost of a new top-up tax, said a person involved in talks on the matter between investors and the government.
articles.web: Foreign firms warn Vietnam of investment freeze without new tax offset, source says

articles.basic_headline: Vietnam's 'bamboo diplomacy' shifts into higher gear
articles.title: Vietnam's 'bamboo diplomacy' shifts into higher gear
articles.description: Communist Party-ruled Vietnam upgraded ties with Australia on Thursday, in the latest success for its "bamboo diplomacy", after it boosted relations last year with the world's top powers, as it tries to navigate rising global tensions.
articles.web: Vietnam's 'bamboo diplomacy' shifts into higher gear

articles.basic_headline: Focus: US officials face tough choices for subsidizing AI chip manufacturing
articles.title: AI chip manufacturing subsidy leaves US officials with tough choices
articles.description: U.S. officials have earmarked close to $30 billion in subsidies for advanced semiconductor manufacturing, aiming to bring cutting-edge artificial-intelligence chip development and manufacturing to American soil.
articles.web: AI chip manufacturing subsidy leaves US officials with tough choices

articles.basic_headline: Baidu may be the world's most unloved AI stock
articles.title: Baidu may be the world's most unloved AI stock
articles.description: Global investors just can't get enough of AI stocks, except if it's Baidu . China's $36 billion search-engine operator lags artificial intelligence leaders like Microsoft , but has made progress on its answer to OpenAI's ChatGPT. Yet its stock plunged 8% in New York trading on Wednesday despite decent results. It now trades below 10 times forward earnings. Blame a wider rout in Chinese equities an
articles.web: Baidu may be the world's most unloved AI stock

articles.basic_headline: South Korea's Yoon, Meta's Zuckerberg discuss AI, digital ecosystems
articles.title: South Korea's Yoon, Meta's Zuckerberg discuss AI, digital ecosystems
articles.description: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol met Meta's CEO Mark Zuckerberg on Thursday for talks to explore ways to increase cooperation with the U.S. company in artificial intelligence (AI) and digital ecosystems, Yoon's office said.

articles.basic_headline: Baidu feels benefit from AI, Q4 revenue rises 6%
articles.title: Baidu feels benefit from AI, Q4 revenue rises 6%
articles.description: China's Baidu , said fourth-quarter revenue rose 6%, helped by gains from its generative AI applications as it ramps up efforts to make money from its investments in the emerging technology.
articles.web: Baidu feels benefit from AI, Q4 revenue rises 6%

articles.basic_headline: Meta's Zuckerberg discusses mixed reality devices, AI with LG leaders in South Korea
articles.title: Meta's Zuckerberg discusses mixed reality devices, AI with LG leaders in South Korea
articles.description: Meta Platforms CEO Mark Zuckerberg on Wednesday met LG Electronics executives to discuss a stronger partnership in extended reality (XR) devices as well as potential cooperation in artificial intelligence (AI), LG said.
